code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import ApplicantContext from"../context/ApplicantContext";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const JobDetails=()=>{const{jobId}=useParams();const[job,setJob]=useState([]);const headers={"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem("access_token")}`};const getJob=()=>{fetch(`/Jobs/List/${jobId}`).then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{setJob(data);}).catch(error=>{console.log(error);});};useEffect(()=>{if(jobId){getJob();}},[jobId]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-header",children:[job.jobtitle," - Job at ",job.companyname]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Salary: \xA3",job.salary]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Job Description: ",job.jobdescription]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Location: ",job.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Date listing was posted: ",job.dateposted]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"card-text",children:["Deadline to apply: ",job.deadline]})]})]});};export default JobDetails;
